original_title: Inspiral Carpets Live At Brixton Academy
overview: The Manchester rock/indie band, the Inspiral Carpets, performed to a packed Academy in April 2003 for the first major headline tour in over 9 years. Here they are seen performing classics such as 'Joe', 'Just How It Feels' and a special version of 'She Comes in the Fall'.
title: Inspiral Carpets Live At Brixton Academy
